aristaRedundancyMIB.name: aristaRedundancyMIB

revisions.description: Initial version of this MIB module.

aristaRedundancyMIB.contactinfo: Arista Networks, Inc. Postal: 5453 Great America Parkway Santa Clara, CA 95054 Tel: +1 408 547-5500 E-mail: snmp@arista.com
aristaRedundancyMIB.description: This MIB module provides configuration and status information pertaining to high availability or redundancy infrastructure on Arista devices. As such, this MIB module is aimed at providing relevant information on 'Modular Systems' which support dual supervisors for control plane redundancy. Each of the dual supervisors are referred to as 'unit' in the module.

AristaRedundancyState.name: AristaRedundancyState
AristaRedundancyState.description: The status of the unit. unknown - The redundancy status is unknown. standby - The unit is initialized, and is in the standby state. active - The unit is currently in active mode. The SNMP agent runs only on the active unit. disabled - The unit is currently disabled.

AristaRedundancyProtocol.name: AristaRedundancyProtocol
AristaRedundancyProtocol.description: The redundancy protocol. unknown - The protocol is unknown. simplex - The peer unit will remain disabled with this protocol. rpr - Route Processor Redundancy. This protocol allows the startup configuration files to be synchronized between the units but not the active operational state. sso - Stateful Switchover. This protocol allows the peer units to synchronize not only configuration but also operational state so when the active unit fails, the peer can take over control plane responsibilities.

aristaRedundancyProtocolConfig.name: aristaRedundancyProtocolConfig
aristaRedundancyProtocolConfig.description: Indicates the configured redundancy protocol in the system.

aristaRedundancyProtocolOper.name: aristaRedundancyProtocolOper
aristaRedundancyProtocolOper.description: Indicates the operational redundancy protocol in the system.

aristaRedundancyUnitStateTable.name: aristaRedundancyUnitStateTable
aristaRedundancyUnitStateTable.description: This table contains the current redundancy state information for the units in the system.

aristaRedundancyUnitStateEntry.name: aristaRedundancyUnitStateEntry
aristaRedundancyUnitStateEntry.description: An entry containing redundancy state information for a unit.

aristaRedundancyUnitId.name: aristaRedundancyUnitId
aristaRedundancyUnitId.description: A unique identifier representing a unit. Usually it is the slot number of the inserted unit on the given modular system.

aristaRedundancyUnitState.name: aristaRedundancyUnitState
aristaRedundancyUnitState.description: The current state of the given unit.

aristaRedundancyUnitStateEntryTime.name: aristaRedundancyUnitStateEntryTime
aristaRedundancyUnitStateEntryTime.description: The value of sysUpTime when the unit entered the given state.

aristaRedundancyLastSwOverReason.name: aristaRedundancyLastSwOverReason
aristaRedundancyLastSwOverReason.description: The reason for the last switchover in the system.

aristaRedundancySwitchOverNotif.name: aristaRedundancySwitchOverNotif
aristaRedundancySwitchOverNotif.description: A switchover notification is generated whenever a unit becomes active and it has taken over the control plane duties.

aristaRedundancyCompliance.name: aristaRedundancyCompliance
aristaRedundancyCompliance.description: The compliance statement for Arista switches that support Redundancy MIB.

aristaRedundancyStatusGroup.name: aristaRedundancyStatusGroup
aristaRedundancyStatusGroup.description: The collection of objects that represent the redundancy status of the system.

aristaRedundancyNotificationsGroup.name: aristaRedundancyNotificationsGroup
aristaRedundancyNotificationsGroup.description: The collection of notifications generated by the system on redundancy change events.
